AssociateLenses.name: AssociateLenses
AssociateLenses.description: Grants permission to associate a lens to the specified workload

AssociateProfiles.name: AssociateProfiles
AssociateProfiles.description: Grants permission to associate a profile to the specified workload

ConfigureIntegration.name: ConfigureIntegration
ConfigureIntegration.description: Grants permission to configure the integration

CreateLensShare.name: CreateLensShare
CreateLensShare.description: Grants permission to an owner of a lens to share with other AWS accounts and IAM users

CreateLensVersion.name: CreateLensVersion
CreateLensVersion.description: Grants permission to create a new lens version

CreateMilestone.name: CreateMilestone
CreateMilestone.description: Grants permission to create a new milestone for the specified workload

CreateProfile.name: CreateProfile
CreateProfile.description: Grants permission to create a new profile

CreateProfileShare.name: CreateProfileShare
CreateProfileShare.description: Grants permission to an owner of a profile to share with other AWS accounts and IAM users

CreateReviewTemplate.name: CreateReviewTemplate
CreateReviewTemplate.description: Grants permission to create a new review template

CreateTemplateShare.name: CreateTemplateShare
CreateTemplateShare.description: Grants permission to an owner of a review template to share with other AWS accounts and IAM users

CreateWorkload.name: CreateWorkload
CreateWorkload.description: Grants permission to create a new workload

CreateWorkloadShare.name: CreateWorkloadShare
CreateWorkloadShare.description: Grants permission to share a workload with another account

DeleteLens.name: DeleteLens
DeleteLens.description: Grants permission to delete a lens

DeleteLensShare.name: DeleteLensShare
DeleteLensShare.description: Grants permission to delete an existing lens share

DeleteProfile.name: DeleteProfile
DeleteProfile.description: Grants permission to delete a profile

DeleteProfileShare.name: DeleteProfileShare
DeleteProfileShare.description: Grants permission to delete an existing profile share

DeleteReviewTemplate.name: DeleteReviewTemplate
DeleteReviewTemplate.description: Grants permission to delete an existing review template

DeleteTemplateShare.name: DeleteTemplateShare
DeleteTemplateShare.description: Grants permission to delete an existing review template share

DeleteWorkload.name: DeleteWorkload
DeleteWorkload.description: Grants permission to delete an existing workload

DeleteWorkloadShare.name: DeleteWorkloadShare
DeleteWorkloadShare.description: Grants permission to delete an existing workload share

DisassociateLenses.name: DisassociateLenses
DisassociateLenses.description: Grants permission to disassociate a lens from the specified workload

DisassociateProfiles.name: DisassociateProfiles
DisassociateProfiles.description: Grants permission to disassociate a profile from the specified workload

ExportLens.name: ExportLens
ExportLens.description: Grants permission to export an existing lens

GetAnswer.name: GetAnswer
GetAnswer.description: Grants permission to retrieve the specified answer from the specified lens review

GetConsolidatedReport.name: GetConsolidatedReport
GetConsolidatedReport.description: Grants permission to get consolidated report metrics or to generate the consolidated report PDF in this account

GetGlobalSettings.name: GetGlobalSettings
GetGlobalSettings.description: Grants permission to get all settings for the account

GetLens.name: GetLens
GetLens.description: Grants permission to get an existing lens

GetLensReview.name: GetLensReview
GetLensReview.description: Grants permission to retrieve the specified lens review of the specified workload

GetLensReviewReport.name: GetLensReviewReport
GetLensReviewReport.description: Grants permission to retrieve the report for the specified lens review

GetLensVersionDifference.name: GetLensVersionDifference
GetLensVersionDifference.description: Grants permission to get the difference between the specified lens version and latest available lens version

GetMilestone.name: GetMilestone
GetMilestone.description: Grants permission to retrieve the specified milestone of the specified workload

GetProfile.name: GetProfile
GetProfile.description: Grants permission to retrieve the specified profile

GetProfileTemplate.name: GetProfileTemplate
GetProfileTemplate.description: Grants permission to retrieve the specified profile template

GetReviewTemplate.name: GetReviewTemplate
GetReviewTemplate.description: Grants permission to retrieve the specified review template

GetReviewTemplateAnswer.name: GetReviewTemplateAnswer
GetReviewTemplateAnswer.description: Grants permission to retrieve the specified answer from the specified review template lens review

GetReviewTemplateLensReview.name: GetReviewTemplateLensReview
GetReviewTemplateLensReview.description: Grants permission to retrieve the specified lens review of the specified review template

GetWorkload.name: GetWorkload
GetWorkload.description: Grants permission to retrieve the specified workload

ImportLens.name: ImportLens
ImportLens.description: Grants permission to import a new lens

ListAnswers.name: ListAnswers
ListAnswers.description: Grants permission to list the answers from the specified lens review

ListCheckDetails.name: ListCheckDetails
ListCheckDetails.description: Grants permission to list the check-details for the workload

ListCheckSummaries.name: ListCheckSummaries
ListCheckSummaries.description: Grants permission to list the check-summaries for the workload

ListLensReviewImprovements.name: ListLensReviewImprovements
ListLensReviewImprovements.description: Grants permission to list the improvements of the specified lens review

ListLensReviews.name: ListLensReviews
ListLensReviews.description: Grants permission to list the lens reviews of the specified workload

ListLensShares.name: ListLensShares
ListLensShares.description: Grants permission to list all shares created for a lens

ListLenses.name: ListLenses
ListLenses.description: Grants permission to list the lenses available to this account

ListMilestones.name: ListMilestones
ListMilestones.description: Grants permission to list the milestones of the specified workload

ListNotifications.name: ListNotifications
ListNotifications.description: Grants permission to list notifications related to the account or specified resource

ListProfileNotifications.name: ListProfileNotifications
ListProfileNotifications.description: Grants permission to list profile notifications related to specified resource

ListProfileShares.name: ListProfileShares
ListProfileShares.description: Grants permission to list all shares created for a profile

ListProfiles.name: ListProfiles
ListProfiles.description: Grants permission to list the profiles available to this account

ListReviewTemplateAnswers.name: ListReviewTemplateAnswers
ListReviewTemplateAnswers.description: Grants permission to list the answers from the specified review template lens review

ListReviewTemplates.name: ListReviewTemplates
ListReviewTemplates.description: Grants permission to list the review templates available to this account

ListShareInvitations.name: ListShareInvitations
ListShareInvitations.description: Grants permission to list the workload share invitations of the specified account or user

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags for a Well-Architected resource

ListTemplateShares.name: ListTemplateShares
ListTemplateShares.description: Grants permission to list all shares created for a review template

ListWorkloadShares.name: ListWorkloadShares
ListWorkloadShares.description: Grants permission to list the workload shares of the specified workload

ListWorkloads.name: ListWorkloads
ListWorkloads.description: Grants permission to list the workloads in this account

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag a Well-Architected resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to untag a Well-Architected resource

UpdateAnswer.name: UpdateAnswer
UpdateAnswer.description: Grants permission to update properties of the specified answer

UpdateGlobalSettings.name: UpdateGlobalSettings
UpdateGlobalSettings.description: Grants permission to manage all settings for the account

UpdateIntegration.name: UpdateIntegration
UpdateIntegration.description: Grants permission to update properties of the integration

UpdateLensReview.name: UpdateLensReview
UpdateLensReview.description: Grants permission to update properties of the specified lens review

UpdateProfile.name: UpdateProfile
UpdateProfile.description: Grants permission to update properties of the specified profile

UpdateReviewTemplate.name: UpdateReviewTemplate
UpdateReviewTemplate.description: Grants permission to update properties of the specified review template

UpdateReviewTemplateAnswer.name: UpdateReviewTemplateAnswer
UpdateReviewTemplateAnswer.description: Grants permission to update properties of the specified review template answer

UpdateReviewTemplateLensReview.name: UpdateReviewTemplateLensReview
UpdateReviewTemplateLensReview.description: Grants permission to update properties of the specified review template lens review

UpdateShareInvitation.name: UpdateShareInvitation
UpdateShareInvitation.description: Grants permission to update status of the specified workload share invitation

UpdateWorkload.name: UpdateWorkload
UpdateWorkload.description: Grants permission to update properties of the specified workload

UpdateWorkloadShare.name: UpdateWorkloadShare
UpdateWorkloadShare.description: Grants permission to update properties of the specified workload share

UpgradeLensReview.name: UpgradeLensReview
UpgradeLensReview.description: Grants permission to upgrade the specified lens review to use the latest version of the associated lens

UpgradeProfileVersion.name: UpgradeProfileVersion
UpgradeProfileVersion.description: Grants permission to upgrade the specified workload to use the latest version of the associated profile
